Description:
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: Black
Motherboard Compatibility: ATX, Micro ATX, ITX
Side Panel Window: Left side panel: Tempered glass with rubber mounts


Expansion
External 5.25" Drive Bays: 0
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 2
Expansion Slots: 7


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: Power button, LED button, HD audio, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x USB 3.0


Cooling System
Fan Options: 3x120mm  fan ports in the front (3x120mm LFO-5312D One-piece ARGB Fan included)
2x120mm or 2x140mm fan ports on the top
1x120mm fan port in the rear (1x120mm  LFO-5312D ARGB Fan included)
2 x 120 mm fan ports on the PSU shroud
Radiator Options: Front - Up to 360mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 320 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 155 mm
Dimensions (H x W x D): 450x195x390mm/17.7x7.7x15.4 inches
Weight: 4.6Kg /10.1lbs
Label: Chasis AZZA CSAZ-290 Fighter
